title: For effective drainage of rain water, the roof of building shall be so constructed or framed as to permit effective drainage of the rain water therefrom by means of rain water pipes
clause_text: For effective drainage of rain water, the roof of building shall be so constructed or framed as to permit effective drainage of the rain water therefrom by means of rain water pipes. Such pipes shall be so arranged, joined and fixed so as to ensure that the rain water is carried away from the building without causing dampness in any part of the walls or foundation of the building or those of adjacent buildings.
